description:
What good is the perfect marketing strategy without knowing how to act on it? Hence this course on the Marketing Plan. Define your strategy and the marketing mix that your product/service or brand should pursue. The marketing plan is a statement of the marketing strategy and the time-related details for carrying out this strategy. 

In developing your marketing plan, you will need to answer such questions as: 
What marketing mix will be offered and to whom? 
What company resources will be needed?
What results are expected? 

After grasping the fundamentals of marketing management and the key components of marketing strategy design, the Marketing Plan course combines all the reviewed concepts in a practical, hands-on way.
title: The Marketing Plan
